summary: The OECD is a group of 38 countries that work together to make their economies stronger and promote world trade. It was started in 1961 and is made up of mostly developed countries with strong economies and high living standards. These countries share ideas and try to solve common problems. The OECD is based in Paris, France, and is an important source of economic information and rankings. Its members' total wealth is very high, making up a large part of the world's economy.
title: OECD
